_sText:
This map is based off of the Halo level in which you rescue soldiers from the crashed lifepods, in that level you come upon an underground chamber where you must open a lightbridge in order to cross with the Warthog.

This is the totally redone version of de_halo 1 and 2, also by me.

Bombsite is at the bridge controls, the goal is to bomb the controls to prevent further crossing.
